tool.help:
======================= Send to STATegra EMS =======================
**What it does**
Use this tool to automatically annotate your current history in a STATegra EMS instance. The tool generates the *file provenance* for each selected file based on the current history and sends it to STATegra EMS, which will create a new Analysis instance associated to the selected Experiment. This Analysis instance will describe the complete process followed to generate the selected files. In addition, files can be stored in the corresponding Experiment data directory. --------
